keyword: how many calories in a spicy mcchicken
title: How Many Calories in a Spicy McChicken?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a spicy McChicken, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, and sodium for this McDonald's sandwich.
h1: How Many Calories in a Spicy McChicken?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Spicy McChicken sandwich: crispy chicken patty with spicy sauce, lettuce, on a sesame seed bun; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations like extra sauce or no bun. Check McDonald's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A Spicy McChicken sandwich contains about 410 calories and 15 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Remove spicy sauce (less heat, milder flavor)

faqs.q: How many calories in a spicy McChicken?
What's the protein in a spicy McChicken?
faqs.a: About 15 g of protein from the chicken patty.

faqs.q: Does the spicy McChicken have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 910 mg, mostly from the seasoning and bun.

faqs.q: How do carbs break down in a spicy McChicken?
faqs.a: Roughly 40 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 5 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is the spicy McChicken higher in calories than regular?
faqs.a: Similar to the regular McChicken at ~400 kcal; spice adds minimal calories.
